import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get subtasks for a ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all subtasks associated with a specific ticket. Returns a paginated list of subtasks including their status, assignee, and completion state.

**Prerequisites**
1. **id** (TicketId) – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. List subtasks: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{id\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-subtasks-for-ticket) with `TicketId`
3. Work subtask: Complete the work item
4. Mark complete: [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{subtaskId\}/complete](/docs/api/tickets/complete-subtask)

**Response Fields**: Each subtask includes `TicketSubtaskId`, `Subject`, `Description`, `IsComplete`, `AssignedUserId`, `AssignedUser` details, and `SortOrder`.

**Query Parameters**: Supports pagination with `$p` (page index) and `$s` (page size).

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/create](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask) – Create new subtask
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{subtaskId\}/complete](/docs/api/tickets/complete-subtask) – Complete subtask
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/\{subtaskId\}/assign/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/assign-subtask) – Assign subtask

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Ticket identifier used to fetch subtasks (GET).","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of subtasks","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"SubtaskId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Subject":{"type":"string"},"IsComplete":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"Subtask"}}},"title":"SubtaskResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
